casebody.data:
RAFOLOVITZ v. AMERICAN TOBACCO CO. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. January 12, 1894.) Action by Joseph Rafolovitz against the American Tobacco Company.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and O’BRIEN and PARKER, JJ.

Charles F. Holm, for plaintiff. Oudin & Oakley, for defendant.

No opinion. Motion granted, with $10 costs. See 23 N. Y. Supp. 274; 25 N. Y. Supp. 1036.
